events.name: Lunch
events.description: Almuerzo, déjeuner, 午餐, hádegismatur, 점심, kwasemini, f00d. Time for some smackerels.

events.name: Kickoff
events.location: Davis Auditorium with Simulcast in 233 Mudd
events.description: LET THE GAMES BEGIN! Drink in the buzzing excitement of DevFest. Prepare yourselves for the start of an awesome week!

events.name: Pitchfest
events.description: Pitch your ideas to potential teammates and form teams.  Saturday's Pitchfest is geared towards hackers who don't plan on attending the Environment Setup Workshop.

events.name: Environment Setup
events.description: Come learn how to properly set up your computer for DevFest. All machines welcome (yes, even you, Windows).

events.name: Open Hacking
events.description: Come hack with your peers and soak in the ambiance of the CS lounge while the space is still fresh and clean. SNACKS PRESENT

events.name: Introduction to Python
events.description: Learn about Python, a great programming language for beginners to advanced hackers. No previous experience required. No snakes were killed in the making of this language.

events.name: Introduction to Python
events.description: Learn about Python, a great programming language for beginners to advanced hackers. No previous experience required. No snakes were killed in the making of this language.

events.name: Open Hacking
events.description: Some light hacking in the midst of the big sportsball game. Come hack with your peers and soak in the ambiance of the CS lounge while the space is still fresh and clean. SNACKS PRESENT

events.name: Dinner
events.description: Come grab a delicious dinner before you head over to the Introduction to Flask workshop.  Or stick around for open hacking!

events.name: Introduction to Flask
events.description: Come learn about Flask and start creating your web app using Python. Flask is a microframework that's very easy to setup and has excellent documentation on its website.

events.name: Open Hacking
events.description: Come hack with your peers and soak in the ambiance of the CS lounge while the space is still fresh and clean. SNACKS PRESENT

events.name: Dinner
events.description: Come grab a delicious dinner before you head over to the Introduction to APIs workshop.  Or stick around for open hacking!

events.name: Introduction to APIs
events.description: An API, or Application Programming Interface, is a way to get resources from another website. And boy, are there tons of APIs! Come prepare your brain so you know what's to come at API demos on Friday! This workshop will take a step aside from our Flask project to build a foundation of knowledge around APIs and how they are used. This workshop will be anything but RESTful -- pun intended, you shall understand in time, young grasshopper.

events.name: Open Hacking
events.description: Come hack with your peers and soak in the ambiance of the CS lounge. SNACKS PRESENT

events.name: Dinner
events.description: Come grab a delicious dinner before you head over to the Introduction to HTML and Templating workshop.  Or stick around for open hacking!

events.name: Introduction to HTML and Templating
events.description: Conjure up websites in our workshop about HTML and templating. Share your important messages through the interwebs, like "Hello World" or pictures of your cat.

events.name: Open Hacking
events.description: Come hack with your peers and soak in the ambiance of the CS lounge. SNACKS PRESENT

events.name: Introduction to CSS
events.description: Our last workshop of the week before send you off into the world as a new hacker! CSS, or Cascading Style Sheets, is a styling language that is used to arrange and stylize HTML elements. Your websites will look better than your CS professors', guaranteed or your money back!

events.name: Open Hacking
events.description: Come hack with your peers and soak in the ambiance of the CS lounge. Crunch time approaches! SNACKS PRESENT

events.name: API Demos
events.description: We have some amazing tech companies presenting their APIs. This is a great opportunity to figure out which APIs to incorporate into your app. Application programming interface? More like AMAZING programming interface!

events.name: Pitchfest
events.description: Pitch your ideas to potential teammates and form teams.

events.name: Dinner
events.description: DINNER NOMZ. The last meal until breakfast, second breakfast, elevenses...

events.name: Hacking Starts!
events.description: Hack till you drop (you can sleep later). Suggested song for the last hour: The Final Countdown. There will be food and caffeine to keep you up throughout the night. Good luck!

events.name: Judging
events.description: JUDGEMENT DAY. Don't worry, you won't be smote; the judges will understand that you're probably sleep deprived. The most important thing is to have fun and be proud of your creation!

events.name: Post-Demos Celebration: DevFest Afterparty
events.description: Anyone & everyone who demoed is invited to come eat delicious food while mingling with the other talented participants, sponsoring companies, and our esteemed judges.
